name: overstock
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to (cause to) have more goods or supplies than are needed: The shop is overstocked (with shoes).
goods of which you have more than you need: We're trying to sell off our overstock/s of last year's fashions.

Add to word list
Add to word list
COMMERCE to have or buy more goods or supplies than are needed: The company is being forced to overstock in order to avoid empty shelves caused by distribution failures.overstock (sth) with sth The shop is overstocked with shoes.
COMMERCE goods or supplies which are more than you need: an overstock of sth We're trying to sell off our overstock of calendars. Factory shops allow manufacturers and retailers to take control of their own overstocks.
